service.name: Mobility Allowance
service.description:
Mobility Allowance (MOB) is paid to people with disabilities over the age of 16 to provide financial assistance with transport costs for those who are undertaking certain activities and are unable to use public transport without substantial assistance.
It is not essential for a customer to be in receipt of an Income Support Payment (e.g. DSP) in order to receive Mobility Allowance.
